content: For the music director;  Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when he fled from Saul in the cave.
For my soul takes refuge in You;
And in the shadow of Your wings I will take refuge
I will cry to God Most High,
To God who accomplishes  for me.
He will send from heaven and save me;
He rebukes the one who tramples upon me.
God will send His favor and His truth.
